app

Class Indexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.Indexer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Indexer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is responsible for indexing all of the words from all of the documents/opuses, and for maintaining the inverted index.
    Author:
    Alex Flores, David Wickizer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
